name: Rustback
description: A hulking, cobbled-together construct of scrap metal and corroded circuitry. Its body is covered in a layer of toxic residue that constantly drips off its spines like molten rust.

flavor.rationale: These constructs were designed to maintain the decaying industrial sector, but have since gone rogue due to faulty programming and exposure to hazardous chemicals. Now they attack anyone who trespasses in their territory.
